author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
## Steps to reproduce

copy one command line that spans two lines in powershell and paste
## Expected behavior

should be pasted as single line
## Actual behavior

line is pasted as two lines with line break

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: Still repros, but not blocking 6.0.0. It's a PSReadline issue, as soon as you remove it, it doesn't repro.

title: Copying from Powershell single line command should not contain a new line
